game.title: The Lost Artifact Quest
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the ruins of a long-forgotten city
game.description: Rumors have it that an artifact of immense power lies hidden in the ruins. Overcome perilous challenges, evade dangers, and secure this treasure for yourself.
game.reward: 1000 gold pieces, magical amulet granting resistance to poison

task.objective: Gather information on the ruins' location.
task.description: Talk to inhabitants in surrounding areas for any clues about the ancient city's whereabouts.
task.location: Village tavern, local market, and town square

task.objective: Navigate the jungle to reach the ruins.
task.description: Be cautious in the dense jungle, facing threats from wildlife, plants, and hidden perils.
task.location: Approximately 5 miles east of the village

task.objective: Overcome traps and puzzles within the ruins.
task.description: Use your intellect to neutralize dangers, discover secret passageways, and unravel ancient riddles to reach the artifact's chamber.
task.location: The hidden entrance to the inner sanctum of the ruins
